trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_SEQ_00<tab>Agujam is worried by what lurks beneath the sands.
TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_TODO_00<tab>Slay any diremites that appear in the rocky area to the west.
TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_001<tab>Ah, you there, adventurer. Should you be willing, I would like your help with something.

TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_002<tab>I have sighted an unusually large number of diremites in the area of late. They always appear after sandstorms. This would not be a problem if they fought fairly. However, they choose to cower beneath the sands, waiting to strike when you are vulnerable.
TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_003<tab>Slay any that you find by the rocky area to the west and I shall see you are rewarded suitably. You have my word.
TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_004<tab>Slay any that you find by the rocky area to the west and I shall see you are rewarded suitably. You have my word.
TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_010<tab>The beasts have been slain? You have my thanks.

TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_011<tab>If the diremites only attacked warriors such as ourselves, this would not have been such a problem. But they will prey on anyone. Women, children, it matters not to them.
TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_012<tab>I will not stand for this. We must not rest until they have been eradicated from the area.
TEXT_STMBDZ611_02789_AGUJAM_000_013<tab>Thank you for helping me to dispatch the first few of them. We will take care of the rest.
